6.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuSa'id al-Khudri: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Seek it (laylat al-Qadr) in the last ten days of Ramadan. Seek it on the ninth, seventh and fifth night. I (AbuNadrah) said: You know counting better than us, AbuSa'id. He said: Yes. I asked: What do you mean by the ninth, seventh and fifth night? He said: When the twenty-first night passes, the night which follows it is the night; when the twenty-third night passes, the night which follows it is the seventh; when the twenty-fifth passes, the night which follows it is the fifth. Abu Dawud said: I do not know whether anything remained hidden from me or not

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ قَالَ لَيْلَةُ إِحْدَى وَعِشْرِينَ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Whoever Said That It Is The Twenty First Night
